translations: 取代；替换；放回（replace 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: He was replaced by Lt. Frank Fraser.
sentences.translation: 他由弗兰克•弗雷泽少尉来取代。

sentences.sentence: Democratic government has now replaced military rule.
sentences.translation: 民主政体现已取代军事统治。

sentences.sentence: Machines have replaced human labour in many industries.
sentences.translation: 在许多行业中，机器已经替代了人力。
